(416-804-9144) Vacuumville has provided Fast and Reliable Central Vacuum services to residential and commercial customers in Toronto area for over 25 years.

***

We are specialists in central and portable vacuum sales, installations and repairs. We carry a range of brands, and can service all makes and models right in your own home. We also have a great selection of parts and accessories.
